Enter your vote today!  Check out the new poll for the nbwrpg 
group:


Should the Council find some way to 
incorporate night time into the RPG? 

  o Yes, it would be good for RPing 
  o No, the Story is good without it. 
  o Why? 
  o Who? 
  o What are you talking about man? 
  o The subject of multiple personalities. 
  o No your not! 
  o Yes I am! 
  o Shut up and let me talk! 


To vote, please visit the following web page:

http://www.egroups.com/polls/nbwrpg 

Note: Please do not reply to this message. Poll votes are 
not collected via email. To vote, you must go to the eGroups 
web site listed above.

Thanks!
